reported_issue: Intermittent alarm system malfunction during patient ventilation
diagnostic_findings: Faulty pressure sensor causing inconsistent alarm triggers
actions_taken: Replaced main pressure sensor, recalibrated alarm sensitivity, performed comprehensive system diagnostic
post_service_notes: System now functioning within normal parameters. Recommend 30-day follow-up monitoring.

diagnostic_findings: Minor wear on primary pump mechanism, battery backup at 92% capacity
actions_taken: Lubricated pump mechanism, replaced battery backup unit, updated firmware
post_service_notes: Device returned to full operational status. No immediate concerns.

reported_issue: Gradient coil temperature instability during imaging sequence
diagnostic_findings: Cooling system malfunction causing potential image quality degradation
actions_taken: Replaced cooling system components, recalibrated gradient coil temperature monitoring, ran comprehensive system diagnostic
post_service_notes: System performance stabilized. Recommend continuous monitoring for any recurring thermal issues.

diagnostic_findings: Slight drift in ECG signal processing, battery performance within acceptable range
actions_taken: Recalibrated ECG signal processing, updated monitoring software, performed comprehensive system check
post_service_notes: Monitor functioning optimally. No critical issues identified.

reported_issue: Inconsistent oxygen flow rate and pressure regulation
diagnostic_findings: Primary control board showing signs of electrical degradation
actions_taken: Replaced main control board, performed full system recalibration, tested oxygen flow parameters
post_service_notes: Ventilator now showing stable oxygen delivery. Recommend close monitoring in critical care setting.

diagnostic_findings: Minor calibration drift in X-ray detector array, cooling system functioning normally
actions_taken: Performed full system calibration, updated imaging software, cleaned and inspected detector array
post_service_notes: CT Scanner operating within manufacturer specifications. No immediate concerns.

reported_issue: Inconsistent drug delivery rate and display malfunctions
diagnostic_findings: Software glitch causing intermittent flow rate errors
actions_taken: Performed complete software reset, updated firmware to latest version, recalibrated pump mechanisms
post_service_notes: Pump now displaying stable drug delivery parameters. Recommend close monitoring.

reported_issue: Routine system calibration and performance check
actions_taken: Recalibrated signal processing algorithms, updated monitoring software, cleaned and inspected lead connections
post_service_notes: ECG Monitor functioning within optimal parameters. No critical issues found.

reported_issue: Image quality degradation and inconsistent radiation exposure
diagnostic_findings: Detector calibration drift and potential X-ray tube wear
actions_taken: Replaced X-ray tube, recalibrated detector array, performed comprehensive radiation output test
post_service_notes: X-Ray system now producing consistent, high-quality imaging. Recommend 60-day follow-up inspection.

reported_issue: Routine system check and gas mixture calibration
diagnostic_findings: Minor variations in gas flow regulators, overall system performance stable
actions_taken: Cleaned and calibrated gas flow regulators, performed leak test, updated ventilation software
post_service_notes: Anesthesia Machine functioning within manufacturer specifications. No immediate concerns.
